main.cpp

#include <iostream>

#include "gpClassifier.h"
#include "gpSquaredExponential.h"
#include "gpNeuralNetwork.h"

using namespace std;

int main (int argc, char * const argv[]) 
{
    
    // Directories
    TString trainingData = "train.root";
    TString testingData = "test.root";
    
    // Instantiate classifier
    gpClassifier classifier(trainingData);
    classifier.setInputTree("candidateTree");
    
    // Set variables
    classifier.addInputVariable("Et");
    classifier.addInputVariable("eSeed");
    classifier.addInputVariable("sumConeTowerEtdEt");
    classifier.addInputVariable("sumConeTrackPtdEt");
    classifier.addInputVariable("sumCandidateTrackPtdEt");
    classifier.addInputVariable("f");
    classifier.addInputVariable("nTowers");
    classifier.addInputVariable("nTracks");
    
    classifier.setOutputVariable("id");
    
    // Retrieve training data
    classifier.retrieveTrainingData();
    
    // Define kernel and prepare for training
    gpSquaredExponential sqExpKernel(classifier.dim());
    classifier.useKernel(&sqExpKernel);
    classifier.prepareTrainingData();
    
    // Optimize covariance hyperparameters and display results
    classifier.setMinInitLogEvidence(-1e4);
    classifier.train(4, true);
    classifier.prepareClassifier();
    classifier.displayRelevance();
    
    // Classify the testing sample
    classifier.processSample(testingData);
    
    return 0;
    
}
